plugins.name: sesh
plugins.description: Session start and close workflows — /pants (put your pants on, one leg at a time) and /shipit

plugins.name: docs
plugins.description: Documentation helpers — /park (parking lot) and /help (in-app help updates)

plugins.name: hooks
plugins.description: Claude Code hooks — /session-start-hook creates automated shell scripts that run when remote sessions boot (dependency installs, env config). Distinct from /sesh:pants, which is a conversational session briefing.
